metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9640 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
oggenc/oggenc.c in vorbis-tools 1.4.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted raw file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9640` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vorbis-tools - 1.4.0-6ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vorbis-tools package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.0-6ubuntu1').
